wikipedia_page.main: Sir Robert Bland Bird, 2nd Baronet KBE (20 September 1876 – 20 November 1960) was a Conservative Party politician in the United Kingdom.

response: * Sir Robert Bird, 2nd Baronet (1876–1960), British politician

link_mentions.page: List of Légion d'honneur recipients by name (B)

response: * Sir Robert Bird, 2nd Baronet (1876–1960), British Conservative Party politician, Member of Parliament (MP) for Wolverhampton West 1922–1929 and 1931–1945
*Sir Robert Bird, 2nd Baronet; MP for Wolverhampton West (1922–1929; 1931–1945)

link_mentions.page: List of foreign recipients of the Légion d'Honneur by country
response: * Sir Robert Bird, 2nd Baronet, awarded the Chevalier de la Légion d'honneur in 1947
